name: node-js-typescript-template
description: Node js application template using typescript.
author: Wunna

scripts.build: npm run build:typescript && npm run build:production
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major --no-verify && git push --follow-tags && git push
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor --no-verify && git push --follow-tags && git push
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch --no-verify && git push --follow-tags && git push
